testsuite.name: FileServerTest

Received: exit the response says that the server has been stopped Server started! Received: GET test_purpose_1713N0.txt File don't exist Sent: All files were sent! start to wait info from client The response says that the file was not found! Client started! client accepted into run Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 start to wait info from client Enter filename: > test_purpose_RGSTZ0.txt The request was sent. Received: DELETE test_purpose_RGSTZ0.txt Sent: All files were sent! start to wait info from client The response says that the file was not found! Client started! client accepted into run start to wait info from client Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_WOJ9RQ4FI.txt The request was sent. Received: DELETE test_purpose_WOJ9RQ4FI.txt Sent: All files were sent! start to wait info from client The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Client started! client accepted into run start to wait info from client Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent. Received: exit the response says that the server has been stopped
